Title: Sweet Bean
Writer: Durian Sukegawa (based on the novel by), Naomi Kawase (screenplay)
Actors: Kirin Kiki, Masatoshi Nagase, Kyara Uchida, Miki Mizuno
Plot: The manager of a pancake stall finds himself confronted with an odd but sympathetic elderly woman looking for work. A taste of her homemade bean jelly convinces him to hire her, which ...
